translation.source: A local minimum occurs at a critical point where the second derivative is positive.
translation.target: Àdínkù àbínibí ṣẹlẹ̀ ní ojúami pàtàkì níbi tí déríféétífù kejì jẹ́ àpọnlé.

translation.source: The domain of a function is the set of all possible input values.
translation.target: Àbújá ìfà jẹ́ àpapọ̀ gbogbo àwọn iye àbáwọlé tó ṣeéṣe.

translation.source: A line segment has two endpoints.
translation.target: Àyè-ìlà ní òpin méjì.

translation.source: A rational number can be expressed as the quotient of two integers.
translation.target: Òòkà déédé le jẹ́ àfihàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìpín méjì òòkà odidi.

translation.source: The median of a set of numbers is the middle value when the numbers are arranged in order.
translation.target: Ààrínlárín ìtò òòkà kan jẹ́ iye àárín nígbà tí a bá to àwọn òòkà náà ní ṣíṣe.

translation.source: The definite integral of a function represents the area under its curve between two points.
translation.target: Ìbúpa alápinpé ìfà kan dúró fún òrò lábẹ́ kọ́fù rẹ̀ láàrín àwọn ojú méjì.

translation.source: To convert a fraction to a decimal, divide the numerator by the denominator.
translation.target: Láti yí ìdàsíwẹ́wẹ́ sí ẹsẹ, pín ètò-òkè pẹ̀lú ètò-ìsàlẹ̀.

translation.source: The greatest common divisor (GCD) of two integers is the largest positive integer that divides both without a remainder.
translation.target: Pínpín àjọṣe púpọ̀jùlọ (GCD) àwọn òòkà odidi méjì jẹ́ òòkà odidi dáradára púpọ̀jùlọ tí ó pín méjèèjì láìsí ìyókù.

translation.source: The definite integral of a function represents the area under its curve.
translation.target: Ìtẹ́gùn pàtó ìfà dúró fún òrò lábẹ́ kọ́ńfù rẹ̀.

translation.source: A triangle has three sides and three angles.
translation.target: Onímẹ́ta ní ẹgbẹ́ mẹ́ta àti igun mẹ́ta.

translation.source: The radius of a circle is the distance from the center to any point on the circle.
translation.target: Igbó ẹ̀ká jẹ́ ìjìnnà láti aarin dé èyíkéyìí ojúami lórí ẹ̀ká náà.

translation.source: The sum of a finite geometric series is S = a₁(1 - rⁿ)/(1 - r), where a₁ is the first term, r is the common ratio, and n is the number of terms.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ ìtẹ̀lé àjé tó ní òpin jẹ́ S = a₁(1 - rⁿ)/(1 - r), níbi tí a₁ jẹ́ ẹ̀yà àkọ́kọ́, r jẹ́ ìbùpín àjọṣe, àti n jẹ́ iye àwọn ẹ̀yà.

translation.source: A trapezoid has one pair of parallel sides.
translation.target: Anígunmẹ́rin aláṣejù ní ẹgbẹ ọgbà méjì kan.

translation.source: A quadratic equation has the form ax² + bx + c = 0.
translation.target: Òfin onirinméjì ní àwòṣe ax² + bx + c = 0.

translation.source: An ellipse is a conic section formed when a plane intersects a cone at an angle to the axis of the cone.
translation.target: Ẹ̀láípsì jẹ́ abala kọ́nìkì tí a ṣẹ̀dá nígbà tí pẹpẹ bá da kọ́nù ní igun sí ọ̀pọ̀n kọ́nù náà.

translation.source: An odd function satisfies f(-x) = -f(x) for all x in its domain.
translation.target: Ìfà èèkà gba f(-x) = -f(x) fún gbogbo x nínú àbújá rẹ̀.

translation.source: Volume is measured in cubic units.
translation.target: A wọn àyè ní àwọn ìdíwọ̀n oníwọ̀nmẹ́ta.

translation.source: The quadratic formula gives the solutions to a quadratic equation.
translation.target: Ìlànà-onírìnméjì fún wa ní àwọn ojútùú ọ̀mì-onírìnméjì.

translation.source: Addition and multiplication are commutative operations.
translation.target: Àròpọ̀ àti ìsọdipúpọ̀ jẹ́ àwọn ìṣirò ọnípààrọ̀.

translation.source: A function is continuous at a point if the limit of the function as the variable approaches that point exists and equals the function value at that point.
translation.target: Ìfà jẹ́ alátìṣu ní ojú kan bí òdíwọ̀n ìfà náà bí onídìmọ̀ ṣe ńṣúnmọ́ ojú náà bá wà tí ó sì dọ́gba pẹ̀lú iye ìfà ní ojú náà.

translation.source: The decimal system has ten digits.
translation.target: Ètò àwọn ẹsẹ ní àwọn ẹyọ-òǹkà mẹ́wàá.

translation.source: The range of a set of numbers is the difference between the maximum and minimum values.
translation.target: Iye-àyèḿbá ìtò òòkà kan jẹ́ ìyàtọ̀ láàrín àwọn iye púpọ̀jùlọ àti kéréjùlọ.

translation.source: A combination is a selection of objects from a set without regard to order.
translation.target: Àdàpọ̀ jẹ́ àṣàyàn àwọn nkan láti ìtò kan láìsí ìfẹ̀sẹ̀ sí ṣíṣe.

translation.source: The slope of a line is the ratio of the vertical change to the horizontal change.
translation.target: Gẹ̀rẹ́ ìlà jẹ́ ìbùpín ìyípadà òòró sí ìyípadà ìbú.

translation.source: The area of a triangle is one-half the base multiplied by the height.
translation.target: Òrò onímẹ́ta jẹ́ ìdajì ìsàlẹ̀ lọ́nà ìsọdipúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú gíga.

translation.source: A critical point of a function occurs where its derivative equals zero or does not exist.
translation.target: Ojúami pàtàkì ìfà ṣẹlẹ̀ níbi tí déríféétífù rẹ̀ dọ́gba òdo tàbí kò sí.

translation.source: A regular polygon has all sides and angles equal.
translation.target: Oníhàkìíhà déédéé ní gbogbo ẹ̀gbẹ́ àti igun dọ́gba.

translation.source: The product rule is used to find the derivative of the product of two functions.
translation.target: A lo òfin ẹ̀sún láti wá déríféétífù ẹ̀sún ìfà méjì.

translation.source: The complement of an angle is 90 degrees minus the angle.
translation.target: Àfikún igun jẹ́ àádọ́rùn-ún àléfà dín igun.

translation.source: A quadratic function can be written in the form f(x) = ax² + bx + c.
translation.target: Ìfà-onírìnméjì le jẹ́ kíkọ ní ọ̀nà f(x) = ax² + bx + c.

translation.source: An infinite series is the sum of all terms in an infinite sequence.
translation.target: Ìtẹ̀lé àìlópin jẹ́ àpapọ̀ gbogbo àwọn ìpín nínú ìṣísẹ̀lẹ̀ àìlópin.

translation.source: Simple interest is calculated as principal × rate × time.
translation.target: A ṣèṣirò èlé gẹ́gẹ́ bí àtìpilẹ̀ × òṣùwọ̀n × àkókò.
